title: They Told Me I Could Be Anything
body:
So I became an in{{champion:202}} ous professor.

Who created perfection.

replies.body:
tbh the best part of that movie was the ending credits.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/d8/d829201aac7cd941a34b5c8d90e974814b5eb6b85639c450824c92e47bd99223.jpg

Oh gorsh. This was never even on my watch list. I loved the first fantastic 4 movie better and the silver surfer one. I never needed to watch another. :P I was talking about the heroes themselves, maybe I shoulda just put some cartoon pics. xD

This.
Basically all summer movies now, that are not not either foreign or made by pixar.
That movie was FAR from perfection
I never even watched the movie. I was only talking about the heroes themselves. ._.
